Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here”
Reviews.Author: Tess14344
Reviews.Content: negatives don’t single – it’s cramped hotel stayed thin walls hear underneath beside avoid hotel light sleeper lounge breakfast depressing positives reception helpful acceptable breakfast 10min walk crossst pancras train stations 5min walk russell square underground station reasonable restaurant pub choices vicinity hotel london holiday depressing

Reviews.Title: “Never again”
Reviews.Author: O2BADon
Reviews.Content: booked hotel bookingcom read ok review system truth clean basic shower unbelievably shower gel hand towels offer bath mat provided worst stay quality sleep floor couple midnight floorboards creaked hear talking worse hours left 3am imagine actually appeared odd hated stay understatement stay 100 nights 10 bad experience charge £130 complete rip

Reviews.Title: “We chose not to stop here”

Reviews.Content: parents booked hotel boyfriend weekend viewing hotel website standard 3 star represented value money arrived story double floor hotel clean updating damp mould walls ceiling bathroom covered mould mildew curtains hanging light fittings worryingly plug socket wed seen decided stay boyfriend reception explain lady reception friendly expected 3 star expect facilities luxury 4 5 star standard cleanliness comfort £100 night dont justify confirmed found hotel weekend corner earls park couple miles clean modern £70 night worth mentioning didnt charged night hotel charged £100 night supposed stay didnt unless paying rock bottom prices dont stay totally agree reviewers serious updating reduce prices £40 £50 night

Reviews.Title: “dirty, no star hotel !”
Reviews.Author: fanette-11
Reviews.Content: shocked pictures luxury clean hotel dirty bad smell due decoration curtain bed cover wall floor particularly dirty noisy mid night 6 am heard train move close complained noise lady reception told smile cant stop train advantage hotel english breakfast served smile foreign personel helpful care location walk 1015 min west underground buses london expensive city pay day quality hotel star sorry time comparison fortunately sunny weather left day hotel breakfast hte hotel sleeping train noise

Reviews.Title: “never more Avonmore”
Reviews.Author: djiban
Reviews.Content: according website winner aa national awards private hotel london qualification bb honour absolutely outdated expensive pictures website wrong impression personnel guests bathroom clean windows carpet warm fan available noisy close underground bathroom tap leaking sink dirty curtain window bedroom tv breakfast table linnen torn covers chairs cutlery dirty tip please stay

Reviews.Title: “Once was enough!”
Reviews.Author: BelfastNicola
Reviews.Content: stayed night mum visiting london craft olympia 2 five minutes foot described award winning disappointed decoration ensuite bigger broom sparks tv mentioned morning owner funny wasnt amused unsafe night definitely

Reviews.Title: “A Huge Disappointment”
Reviews.Author: AlyBerk
Reviews.Content: plus location check arrived heathrow 8am hotel 10 stopping breakfast clean beds bedding comfortable minus despite clean extremely shabby walls paper thin difficult fall asleep noise mine half lightbulbs including bathroom reading lamps beds fixtures bed bulb proprietor mean daughter late scheduled breakfast time times told breakfast served scolded late toast tea coffee english breakfast expecting dont forget aware lift stairs narrow difficult maneuver luggage

Reviews.Title: “My husband and adult daughter and I enjoyed a very pleasant two-night stay at the Avonmore.”
Reviews.Author: Gary093
Reviews.Content: indicated arriving late night discouraging tiring trip person duty looked blankly arrival produce proof registration book names written comfortable stay included delicious breakfasts liked staying quiet neighborhood close tube quick access london

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: iMtrippinUK
Reviews.Content: stayed night visiting friends passing london night left hotel cheaply decorated christmas decorations june photos site representation window cracked bedspread stained cable input tv frayed messed signal tv shower door bathtub wouldnt slide mold bathroom reading reviews hotel prepared fabulous admit staff friendly breakfast indeed soaps coffee expectations youre passing town sleep alright probably cheaper price definately quality worth 3 stars

Reviews.Title: “comfortable, great breakfast, good location, 3 good beds in one room”
Reviews.Author: jess1960
Reviews.Content: stayed day weekend 3 girl friends 3 separate beds sam reasonable price â£40 head night bb website makes hotel look prettier shabby chic decor steep stairs pretty dated bathroom love stay staff looked clean cosy beds comfortable breakfast cooked beautifully served quiet windows warm earplugs cut noise 5 minutes walk west kensington underground station definitely stay staff help facelift

Reviews.Title: “for the price i paid, awful”
Reviews.Author: looloobell
Reviews.Content: hotel steep stairs booked booked double late checkout told late checkout fine booked fine morning phone call 1145 telling leave 10 mins rush lady record request booked else booked double 2 single beds staff understand left didnt feel safe fire alarm hanging wall fire escape climb 8 flights aswell breakfast awful
